channel.title: Shops
channel.description: Alright, so I have too much skilling outfit material for one shop. So I want to make two. I wanted to do this; add Party Pete as the NPC that opens the shop(I can put the items etc in the shops.cfg), and whatnot. But I want to add it to where if you click "Talk to" it would normally open the shop. But I want to make it to where if you click it, it'll give you options for "Skiller Shop (Part 1)" or "Skiller Shop (Part 2)", like the interface thing like the teleports. How?

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Alright, so I have too much skilling outfit material for one shop. So I want to make two.
I wanted to do this; add Party Pete as the NPC that opens the shop(I can put the items etc in the shops.cfg), and whatnot. But I want to add it to where if you click “Talk to” it would normally open the shop. But I want to make it to where if you click it, it’ll give you options for “Skiller Shop (Part 1)” or “Skiller Shop (Part 2)”, like the interface thing like the teleports.
How?

Read full topic
